def.title: White Room
def.description: A featureless white room. A pitch black void in the shape of archway can be seen on the east side of the room.

exits.leaveMessage: steps into the void and disappears.

roomList.description: A featureless white room. A pitch black void in the shape of archway can be seen on the east side of the room.

exits.leaveMessage: steps into the void and disappears.

roomList.title: White Room

def.title: Black Room
def.description: A completely black room. Somehow all of the light that should be coming from the room to the west does not pass through the archway. A single lightbulb hangs from the ceiling illuminating a small area. To the east you see a large white dome. There is a sign above the entrance to the dome: "Training Area"

exits.leaveMessage: steps into the light and disappears.

roomList.description: A completely black room. Somehow all of the light that should be coming from the room to the west does not pass through the archway. A single lightbulb hangs from the ceiling illuminating a small area. To the east you see a large white dome. There is a sign above the entrance to the dome: "Training Area"

exits.leaveMessage: steps into the light and disappears.

roomList.title: Black Room

def.title: Training Room
def.description: The entire area is covered by a large dome with a hexagonal grid surface. A beautiful blue sky reaches from horizon to horizon, punctuated by the lines of the grid. The dome shimmers as virtual birds fly into and out of its surface. The pure green grass is eerily undisturbed by you walking over it or by the simulated breeze.

def.title: Boss Training Room
def.description: The dome in this section is bright red, the pure green grass is replaced with a smooth white surface. The ground beneath your feet has the word "Danger" in bright red letters tiled across the area.

roomList.description: The dome in this section is bright red, the pure green grass is replaced with a smooth white surface. The ground beneath your feet has the word "Danger" in bright red letters tiled across the area.
roomList.title: Boss Training Room

def.title: Ancient Wayshrine
def.description: A runed black obelisk towers in the center of this clearing, surrounded by a faerie ring. The runes pulse and glow with a soft blue light. The grass immediately around the obelisk is immaculate in stark contrast to the dying former meadow that makes up the clearing.

roomList.description: A runed black obelisk towers in the center of this clearing, surrounded by a faerie ring. The runes pulse and glow with a soft blue light. The grass immediately around the obelisk is immaculate in stark contrast to the dying former meadow that makes up the clearing.
roomList.title: Ancient Wayshrine

def.title: Wally's Wonderful Wares (Shop)
def.description: A very brightly colored shop stall stands in the middle of an otherwise desolate clearing. The stall is covered in colorful cloth, shining gems, and battle gear of all varieties. A large sign sits next to the products: "Wally's Wonderful Wares has the best products in town! Armor, weapons and potions, you name and we... might have it!"

Armor, weapons and potions, you name and we... might have it!"

def.title: Room Context Commands Test
def.description: This room shows off commands that are only active in a particular room. Try out the roomtest command.

npcs.name: 6da80bf5-390b-45f9-9fec-f63f39909c4c
npcs.description: The rat's beady red eyes dart frantically, its mouth foaming as it scampers about.

npcs.name: 270bb4df-200d-4a25-b488-30fa9b971fd0
npcs.description: A wise looking old man sits on the ground with legs crossed.

npcs.name: 2a86f0a1-dea8-4943-9edf-2a7000ce9edb
npcs.description: A wide-eyed puppy stares up at you.

npcs.name: 44601f3a-e432-4498-ab3e-6b6521df66d4
npcs.description: The training dummy is almost human shaped although slightly out of proportion. The material it's made of is hard to discern; it seems to constantly change between metal, wood, cloth, and glass depending on the angle. There is a large red and white bullseye painted on its chest. The dummy has no eyes and mindlessly meanders about the area.

npcs.name: 535c5ac6-dc72-4355-81a1-5d0b5fe7152d
npcs.description: This dummy is significantly larger than the others. Bright red with a monstrous figure it lumbers around the area with a great echoing stomp. Where the other target dummies have a bullseye this dummy has a yellow exclamation mark.
